fr.liglab.icasa.self.star.temperature.management.exercice.three.temperature.controller

Interface TemperatureConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    temperatureControllerImpl

    public interface TemperatureConfiguration
    The TemperatureConfiguration service allows one to configure the temperature controller.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getTargetedTemperature(String room)
      Gets the targetted temperature of a given room.
      void setMaximumAllowedEnergyInRoom(double maximumEnergy)
      Sets the maximum allowed energy consumption in Watts in each room
      void setTargetedTemperature(String targetedRoom, float temperature)
      Configure the controller to reach a given temperature in Kelvin in a given room.
      void turnOff(String room)
      Turn off the temperature management in the given room
      void turnOn(String room)
      Turn on the temperature management in the given room

    • Method Detail

      • setTargetedTemperature

        void setTargetedTemperature(String targetedRoom,
                          float temperature)
        Configure the controller to reach a given temperature in Kelvin in a given room.
        Parameters:
        targetedRoom - the targeted room name
        temperature - the temperature in Kelvin (>=0)

      • getTargetedTemperature

        float getTargetedTemperature(String room)
        Gets the targetted temperature of a given room.
        Parameters:
        room - the room name
        Returns:
        the temperature in Kelvin

      • turnOn

        void turnOn(String room)
        Turn on the temperature management in the given room
        Parameters:
        room - the given room

      • turnOff

        void turnOff(String room)
        Turn off the temperature management in the given room
        Parameters:
        room - the given room

      • setMaximumAllowedEnergyInRoom

        void setMaximumAllowedEnergyInRoom(double maximumEnergy)
        Sets the maximum allowed energy consumption in Watts in each room
        Parameters:
        maximumEnergy - the maximum allowed energy consumption in Watts in each room
